title: Kanpeki Ojousama no Watakushi ga Dogeza de Mazo Ochisuru Choroin na Wakenai desu wa!
synopsis: Student council presidents are often respected or even feared by the students at their school. Combine these traits with an astonishingly beautiful appearance and you get Irina Shiroganeâ€”a seemingly perfect student who everyone looks up to.
